title: Drawing, Study for a fresco for the hall of the Senate, Genova:  The relics of St. John Baptist are brought to Genova, ca. 1715
title_raw: Study for a fresco for the hall of the Senate, Genova:  The relics of St. John Baptist are brought to Genova
medium: Brush and gray wash, pen and ink, over graphite on paper.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: At right the dock with ships.  At left, a procession headed by the archbishop and the doge. In the foreground left, people around a fountain; right: captives are driven away and good unloaded.  The bearers of the bier are still under a canopy on the ship in the center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Study for a fresco for the hall of the Senate, Genova:  The relics of St. John Baptist are brought to Genova, ca. 1715. Brush and gray wash, pen and ink, over graphite on paper.. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7279
